mapper.insert: insert into tbl_reply (rno, bno, reply, replyer) values ((select nextval('seq_reply') from dual ), #{bno}, #{reply}, #{replyer})
mapper.update: update tbl_reply set reply = #{reply}, updateDate = current_timestamp where rno = #{rno}
mapper.select: select rno, bno, reply, replyer, replyDate, updateDate from tbl_reply where bno = #{bno} order by rno asc
